sentence: we liked the friendliness of the staff the lobby and the restaurant
Chose because of location amenities and price
The hotel has a super swimming pool sauna and 24hour gym
This hotel has comfortable rooms good service and nice amenities
Amazing hotel staff facilities location WIFI the best place to stay in Basel
The lobby is a really nice lounge still place to have a good drink and be inspired

We used the gym and swimming pool these are good and the pool is plenty big enough to swim properly in The location of the hotel is very good a few minutes walk from the Swiss train station Bahnhof SB and a few minutes in the other direction for the old town
Hotel was comfortable gym small but ok breakfast again ok
Room was fine excellent mattresses bed and was usually cleaned early enough and coffee tea toiletries linen renewed as expected
Hotel has a good gym and a Large swimingpol Large enough to do swim trainings 20 meter
Reception space is being reconstructed but the staff were great and there were some refreshments on offer all the time
Yes when we arrived we found out the hotel and especially the lobby is under construction and the pool is closed

We travelled with friends who received a bigger room than us with a bath whereas we had an inner courtroom view with no room for 2 people in the bathroom our safe did not work even after we reported it to reception our bags could not be easily located after we had left them for a few hours after check out
A number of areas require improvement eg furnishings availability of staff at reception communication between service personnel provision and layout of breakfast items
There was a complete lack of security at the hotel entrance and to the breakfast room restaurant and this lack of checks on who was getting in put my safety as a guest at risk
When I told the reception staff it was handled very casually
